abstract: A day after huge protests, a fairly quiet autumn afternoon at New York's newest attaction.
snippet: A day after huge protests, a fairly quiet autumn afternoon at New York's newest attaction.
lead_paragraph: A day after protesters associated with the Occupy Wall Street movement fanned out in several marches from the southern tip of Manhattan to Times Square, resulting in dozens of arrests, Sunday's protests were somewhat smaller and significantly more subdued.

headline.main: Sunday in Zuccotti Park, With a Celebrity Entertainer, or Two
